segments.text: Mary , there's one more thing that you must do for me before you leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to take the math and English evaluation tests .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you're from a foreign country . The school needs to find out how good you are at both basic skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's so that I can be put into the right math and English classes , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is going to take more time than I thought .
segments.speaker: S2
